control.description-key: Fluent UI v9 Dialog Component for Canvas Apps

property.name: IsOpen
property.description-key: Controls whether the dialog is visible. Set to a variable and toggle it to show/hide the dialog.

property.name: ModalType
property.description-key: Dialog behavior type: Modal blocks page interaction, Non-Modal page remains interactive, Alert must dismiss via button

property.name: Title
property.description-key: Dialog title displayed at the top

property.name: ContentText
property.description-key: Main message or content displayed in the dialog body
property.default-value: This is the dialog content. Add your message here.
property.pfx-default-value: "This is the dialog content. Add your message here."

property.name: PrimaryButtonText
property.description-key: Text for the main action button

property.name: SecondaryButtonText
property.description-key: Text for the secondary action button

property.name: ShowPrimaryButton
property.description-key: Show or hide the primary button

property.name: ShowSecondaryButton
property.description-key: Show or hide the secondary button

property.name: ShowCloseButton
property.description-key: Show X button in the title bar. Automatically shown for Non-Modal dialogs.

property.name: ActionsPosition
property.description-key: Where to align the action buttons: End is right-aligned, Start is left-aligned

property.name: FluidActions
property.description-key: Stretch buttons to equal widths filling the dialog footer

property.name: UserAction
property.description-key: Returns which action the user took: primary, secondary, close, or dismiss

event.name: OnPrimaryAction
event.description-key: Fires when the primary button is clicked

event.name: OnSecondaryAction
event.description-key: Fires when the secondary button is clicked

event.name: OnClose
event.description-key: Fires when the dialog is closed by any means

event.name: OnOpenChange
event.description-key: Fires whenever the dialog open state changes
